description:
A year after his match against Oobayashi, Eiichiro has practiced hard for his return to the Kanagawa Junior Circuit, and he`s doing some wall hitting to warm up. The soon runs into Miyagawa Takuya, Araya Hiroshi, and his other rivals at the tournament. When asked who will win, Natsu responds that Ei-chan will play a big role. The matches are about to begin.
Source: crunchyroll
